col1_html.content:
LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR BOUTIQUE HOTEL IN KEY WEST

Contact The Gates Hotel Key West

The Gates Hotel Key West is a new lifestyle hotel in Key West that offers 100 contemporary accommodations with an urban chic flare. Featuring one of the best locations for hotels in Key West, our family-friendly Key West hotel is located at the entrance of the island. For more information or directions, contact our front desk and take a peek at our map below.

You can find detailed information about accessibility in our Accessibility Statement.
